item.title: Megan add a quote by Bob Marley
item.description: "Who are you to judge the life I live? I know I'm not perfect -and I don't live to be- but before you start pointing fingers... make sure you hands are clean!" -- Bob Marley

item.title: Megan add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "But better to get hurt by the truth than comforted with a lie." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Megan add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Simplicity, patience, compassion. These three are your greatest treasures. Simple in actions and thoughts, you return to the source of being. Patient with both friends and enemies, you accord with the way things are. Compassionate toward yourself, you reconcile all beings in the world." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Megan add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "Just when you think it can't get any worse, it can. And just when you think it can't get any better, it can." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Megan add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Megan add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
Megan add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Megan add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Make the most of yourself....for that is all there is of you." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Megan add a quote by Katharine Hepburn
item.description: "Love has nothing to do with what you are expecting to get - only with what you are expecting to give - which is everything" -- Katharine Hepburn

item.title: Megan add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "Maybe who we are isn't so much about what we do, but rather what we're capable of when we least expect it." -- Jodi Picoult
